document.docAuthor: Khedher, Hassib Ben, Yildirim, Erol, Braham, Mohamed & Ljubomirov, Toshko
document.masterDocTitle: First checklist of Tunisian sphecid wasps (Hymenoptera: Sphecidae) with new and additional records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First checklist of Tunisian sphecid wasps (Hymenoptera: Sphecidae) with new and additional records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ammophila ? kirbii Vander Linden, 1827
. Nouvelles Mémoires de l’Académie Royale des Sciences et Belles Lettres de Bruxelles, 4: 360.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Sphex albisectus : Graeffe, 1906: 456
( Ben Arous );
Smits van Burgst, 1913: 319
( Tunisia : no specific locality).

Sphex (Enodia) albisectus : von Schulthess, 1926: 209
( Nabeul, Sfax, Tozeur ).

General distribution. Angola , Austria , Bulgaria , Central African Republic , China , Congo, Croatia , Czech Republic , Eritrea , Ethiopia , France , Greece , Hungary , Iran , Israel , Italy , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Malta , Mozambique , North Africa, Portugal , Romania , Russia , Slovakia , Slovenia , South Africa , Spain , Switzerland , Syria , Tajikistan , Tanzania , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine , United Arab Emirates , Uzbekistan , Yemen , Zaire ( Pulawski 2019 ).
